title: Number of knife crimes in London 2010 to 2019
summary: Overall Number of offences (in 1,000s) has decreased over the Year.
Number of offences (in 1,000s) is slightly decreasing from 2010/11 to 2013/14, and lastly roughly constant from 2013/14 to 2015/16.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2011/12 and 2012/13.
Maximum Number of offences (in 1,000s), about 14.17 was reported at Year 2011/12
The lowest Number of offences (in 1,000s), of value 9.69 was reported at Year 2014/15
